dek: What jobs are you physically willing to do?

questions.variable: Percent of workers, crawling is required
questions.text: Are you willing to do a job that may require you to crawl?

questions.variable: Percent of workers, crouching is required
questions.text: Are you willing to do a job that may require you to crouch?

questions.variable: Percent of workers, kneeling is required
questions.text: Are you willing to do a job that may require you to kneel?

questions.variable: Percent of workers, reaching overhead is required
questions.text: Are you willing to do a job that will likely require you to reach overhead?

questions.variable: Percent of workers, problem solving is required less often than monthly, including never
questions.text: Are you willing to do a job that likely won’t require problem solving – ever?

questions.variable: Percent of workers, exposed to outdoors
questions.text: Are you willing to do a job that likely requires being outdoors?

questions.variable: Percent of workers, exposed to wetness
questions.text: Are you willing to do a job that likely requires being exposed to wetness?

questions.variable: Percent of day where standing is required, mean
questions.text: Are you willing to be required to stand at least 50% of the day?

questions.variable: Percent of day where sitting is required, mean
questions.text: Are you willing to be required to sit at least 50% of the day?

variable: Percent of workers, with the ability to pause work
text: Are you willing to do a job that likely won’t give you the ability to pause work?
